author: Samuel Rubenfeld
title: The Morning Risk Report: U.K. to Target Scottish Firms in Money-Laundering Crackdown
text:
Readers can subscribe to here: http://on.wsj.com/MorningRiskReportSignup. Follow us on Twitter at @WSJRisk. The sun sets over the skyline, in Edinburgh, Scotland, in 2017. Associated Press Good morning. The U.K. government will crack down on the abuse of certain Scottish firms that are sometimes used to launder money, including from Russia. The [â€¦]
